name: Zombie Hunter Lite
description:
[INTRODUCTION]
Indie Game Competition 2010 Smartphone Silver Prize Winner!
Archers of Magic bullet: Zombie Hunter's finally here!

----------------------------------------
[Game Features]
New concept Dragging Action Defense game, Zombie Hunter!!

Flocking Endless zombies.
Pouring endless bullets.
Magic bullets Action!
Destrudo! Zombie Hunter released!
Breathtaking Drag action!
Crossing fixed track of a bullet

With powerful cursed Magic Bullets
Make violations of zombies!

With Evolving equipment and weapons.
Become powerful hunter!

Various powerful stages.
From a city dominated by zombie
To the mysterious laboratory!

A variety of missions and challenges.
absorbing addictive Missions.

Eliminate Zombies with 5 types magic bullets!
20 stages and 4 chapters!
4 boss Zombies!
Various missions and challenges.

----------------------------------------
[How to Play]
1 Touch your character.
2 Drag from character to magic bullet mirror, make bullet track and touch up.
3 more reflected track, more powers.
